LRC, in pencil: [1-81-1]; on back, LRC. in pencil: [ML1053]
markings: Watermark: Eagle? or Coat of arms?? [obscured] above three monti and scrollwork around ANZANO (not in Briquet or Heawood)

title: Study of a Standing Male Nude and Seated Female Nude
